Metadata: First steps in harnessing the potential of biomineralizati​on as a route to new high-​performance composite materials

This paper discusses some of the initial steps in realizing the potential of biomineralizati​on as a route to new high- performance composite materials. Ordered microlaminate and multiphasic composites are produced "in vitro" utilizing. The molecular mechanisms that direct formation of the mineralized composites of the molluscan shell and flat pearl.
